metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11206 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An out of bounds read was discovered in H5O_fill_new_decode andH5O_fill_old_decode in H5Ofill.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.2 library. It couldallow a remote denial of service or information disclosure attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
